title: Day 01 (Resonance and Filters)
description: Understand the concept of resonance in RLC circuits and explore how filters like low-pass, high-pass, band-pass, and band-stop work to shape electrical signals. Includes practical examples and theory breakdown.
subject: theory-of-electricity
author: Teshan Kannangara

title: Day 02 (Fundamental and Network Theorems)
description: Dive into essential network theorems such as Ohm’s Law, Kirchhoff’s Laws, Thevenin’s and Norton’s Theorems. Learn how to simplify and analyze complex electrical circuits using these powerful tools.
subject: theory-of-electricity
author: Kalana Lakshan

title: Multivariable Calculus Kuppi 01
description: Covers the foundational concepts of Multivariable Calculus, including the transition from single-variable functions, real and vector-valued functions, curves, surfaces, and level sets.
subject: methods-of-mathematics
author: Nipun Rathnayake

title: Multivariable Calculus Kuppi 02
description: Session 02 of the Multivariable Calculus Kuppi series. This session includes a tutorial segment to reinforce concepts from the first Kuppi and covers the fundamental topic of limits for multivariable functions, a crucial step towards exploring continuity.
subject: methods-of-mathematics
author: Lasan Perera

title: Multivariable Calculus Kuppi 03
description: Session 03 of the Multivariable Calculus Kuppi series. .
subject: methods-of-mathematics
author: Adeepa

title: Program Construction CSE Kuppi - March 27 2025
description: OOP Concepts an Memory Allocation, There are two videos, one is in youtube. other one download through Telegram
subject: program-construction
author: Suhas Dissanayake
